src:
Sporočilo uredništvom - zbirno in tematsko o prekinitvi sodelovanja med vlado in Levico

06 Nov 2019, 18:33


Ljubljana, 6. novembra - STA bo do 20.30 objavila zbirno vest o prekinitvi sodelovanja med vlado in Levico ter tematski prispevek o posledicah za delovanje Levice kot opozicijske stranke v DZ.
text:
Message to the editorial boards - summary and thematic on the end of cooperation between the government and the Left

06 Nov 2019, 17:33


Ljubljana, 6 November - By 20:30, the STA will publish a news bulletin on the discontinuation of cooperation between the government and the Left, as well as a thematic contribution on the consequences for the left of the Left as an opposition party in the National Assembly.
